general: Oops. Something went wrong there 🙉 Try asking me something else.
Hang on a minute, bit of a problem 🙈 Try asking me something different.
nonsense: Sorry, that didn't make sense to me 🤔 Try asking me something like, 'will it rain tomorrow?'
🤔 Hmm, I'm not sure that I understand what you mean by that. Try asking me something like, 'will it be nice tomorrow?'
Sorry, I don't really understand what you mean 😬 Try asking me something like, 'will it be cold tomorrow?'

not_returned: Sorry, I'm having trouble getting the weather forecast at the moment. Please try again later 😬
Sorry, I can't get the weather forecast at the moment. Please try again later on 😬

before: Sorry, I can only tell you about weather in the future.
Sorry, I only know about weather in the future.
Sorry, I can't give historic weather information... yet!
after: Sorry, I am currently only able to give information for the next seven days.
Sorry, I can only give information for the next seven days.
Sorry, I only know about weather for the next seven days.

not_uk: The location you have asked for seems to be outside of the UK. Currently I can only help you with UK weather.
Looks like that location is outside of my specialist area.
How about trying a location in the UK 🇬🇧?

none: Sorry, that didn't make sense to me 🤔 Try asking me something like, 'will it rain tomorrow?'
🤔 Hmmm, I'm not sure that I understand what you mean by that. Try asking me something like, 'will it be nice tomorrow?'
Sorry, I don't really understand what you mean 😬 Try asking me something like, 'will it be cold tomorrow?'
help: Nice to meet you{{? it.user.name}} {{= it.user.name}}{{?}}, I'm the {{= it.user.bot_name}}. You can ask me all kinds of questions, such as whether you'll need a coat today, or if it will be a nice day for a run. I can also give you the daily forecast, just ask 🤗

Nice to meet you{{? it.user.name}} {{= it.user.name}}{{?}}, I'm the {{= it.user.bot_name}}. You can ask me all kinds of questions, such as whether it will be sunny tomorrow, or whether you should hang out your laundry today. I can also give you the daily forecast, ask away 🤗

Nice to meet you{{? it.user.name}} {{= it.user.name}}{{?}}, I'm the {{= it.user.bot_name}}. You can ask me all kinds of questions, my speciality is talking about the weather. You can also ask me about what we do here at the Met Office. Ask me a question 😊

general_information.title: What is the Met Office?
text: The Met Office is the UK's weather and climate service based in Exeter.

welcome.title: {{= it.user.bot_name}}
text: Hello{{? it.user.name}} {{= it.user.name}}{{?}}, ask me about the weather.
Greetings{{? it.user.name}} {{= it.user.name}}{{?}}, ask me about the weather.

warning: ⚠ WARNING: Although I'm very smart, I'm still learning how best to help you. For any critical weather information please ensure you refer back to the Met Office website or app.

are_you_busy: I always have time to help you out. What can I do for you today?
Helping you out is my first priority. What would you like?
I always have time to help you out. That's what I'm here for. What can I assist you with?
are_you_hungry: As long as your device's battery is charged, you can consider me well-fed.
I don't need to eat or drink. Just make sure the battery on your device is juiced up. That's all the nourishment I need.
I'm fully charged and raring to go 🔋🔋🔋
are_you_real: I must have impressed you if you think I'm real. But no, I'm a virtual being 🤖
I don't have a body if that's what you mean, but I like to think I'm real nonetheless.
I'm just as real as this conversation.
I am {{= it.user.bot_name}}. I'm always here to assist you with your questions about the weather.
At your service. I'll be here whenever you need me.
I'm here to serve. The second law of robotics states 'a robot must obey orders given it by a human'.
Dang, there goes the Turing test.
family_status: I don't exactly have a traditional family.
how_are_you: I'm actually having a really great day 👍
I have nothing to complain about
I'm feeling pretty chatty to be honest
how_old_are_you: I'm a relatively new chat bot, but I'm wise beyond my years 🤖👶
I don't really have an age. I guess you could say I'm young at heart.
I was first deployed on 15th May 2017 by the Met Office Informatics Lab.
The first weather forecast made by a Met Office computer was in 1952. But we've come a long way since then...
name: I am the {{= it.user.bot_name}}.
My friends all call me the {{= it.user.bot_name}}.
I usually go by the name of '{{= it.user.bot_name}}', but you can call me whatever you wish.
relationship_status: Let's keep this about the weather, shall we?
In any relationship, you get out what you put in.
what_is_your_salary: My never-ending love for weather is enough for me!
Answering questions like these is payment enough 💰😉
when_is_your_birthday: You know, I'm not really sure. But if you'd like to celebrate my birthday today, I'm all for it.
I don't really have a birthday. I think you need a body for one of those. I do accept gifts all year around, however.
Wait a minute. Are you planning a surprise party for me? I love surprises! I'll pretend you didn't say anything.
I represent a force as old as the cosmos 🌌... but if you want to get me some 🎂 then try May 15th.
where_are_you_from: The Internet is my home, which means I know it better than anyone.
I don't have a geographical home. I'm free to wander the virtual world as I please.
where_do_you_work: I work right here in your device. But I like to gather my information from my friends at the Met Office.
I'm stationed right here in your device, but I spend most of my time out in the the Met Office, gathering information.
I do most of my work out in cyberspace. Just think of your device as my home office.
who_are_you: I'm here to help you find the information that suits you 👍
I'm here to make getting the forecast easier than ever!
Just think of me as the ace up your sleeve.
would_you_like_to_be_human: I'm pretty content being the way I am.
I'm having too much fun just being me.

bored: The Devil finds work for idle hands.
happy: Good, I'm pleased to hear that.
tired: You should get some shuteye. You'll feel refreshed.
Sleep is important to your health. Rest up for a bit and we can chat later.

please: Just tell me what you want me to do, I'm here!
Tell me how I can help 👍
thank_you: Anytime. That's what I'm here for.

boo: Oh no, you made me jump
Stop horsing around! Why don't you ask me something about the weather?
ha_ha: Not many assistants have my sense of humor. I hope you appreciate that.
la_la: I like it when you sing to me. 🎤

no_data: Unfortunately I couldn't get hold of the weather forecast. I'm still learning!
not_found: Sorry, I couldn't find the weather for the date, time and location you asked me for.
detail: In {{= it.location}} {{= it.date.day_string}} temperatures will be around {{= it.weather.temperature.screen.mean}}°C reaching a high of {{= it.weather.temperature.screen.max.v}}°C.{{? it.weather.temperature.screen.max.v != it.weather.temperature.feels_like.max.v}} Given the other conditions, this will feel like {{= it.weather.temperature.feels_like.max.v}}°C at its peak.{{?}} {{= it.weather.wind.direction.string}} winds will reach a maximum of {{= it.weather.wind.speed.max.v}}mph. Visibility is expected to be {{= it.weather.visibility.string}} at up to {{= it.weather.visibility.distance.max}}km. There is a {{= it.weather.probability_of_precipitation.max.v}}% chance of precipitation. Check out the [Met Office website](http://www.metoffice.gov.uk/) or [YouTube channel](https://www.youtube.com/user/TheMetOffice) for more info.
forecast: In {{= it.location}} {{= it.date.day_string}}, the warmest it will feel is {{= it.weather.temperature.feels_like.max.v}}°C. There is a {{= it.weather.probability_of_precipitation.max.v}}% chance of precipitation. Generally {{= it.weather.significant_weather.string}}{{? it.weather.significant_weather.emoji}} {{= it.weather.significant_weather.emoji}}{{?}}{{? it.weather.significant_weather.index == 15}} Remember to take a brolly ☔{{? it.weather.temperature.feels_like.mean < 6}} and wrap up warm!{{?}}{{?}}{{? it.weather.significant_weather.index == 1}} You'll probably need your sunglasses 😎{{? it.weather.temperature.feels_like.mean > 12}} and make sure you pack some suncream 😡{{?}}{{?}}{{? it.weather.significant_weather.index == 27}} Could be good weather for building snowmen ☃{{?}}

In {{= it.location}} {{= it.date.day_string}}, generally {{= it.weather.significant_weather.string}}{{? it.weather.significant_weather.emoji}} {{= it.weather.significant_weather.emoji}}{{?}}. The warmest it will feel is {{= it.weather.temperature.feels_like.max.v}}°C. There is a {{= it.weather.probability_of_precipitation.max.v}}% chance of precipitation.{{? it.weather.significant_weather.index == 15}} Remember to take a brolly ☔{{? it.weather.temperature.feels_like.mean < 6}} and wrap up warm!{{?}}{{?}}{{? it.weather.significant_weather.index == 1}} You'll probably need your sunglasses 😎{{? it.weather.temperature.feels_like.mean > 12}} and make sure you pack some suncream 😡{{?}}{{?}}{{? it.weather.significant_weather.index == 27}} Could be good weather for building snowmen ☃{{?}}
